name: Digital Pressure Gauge–0.05% FS Accuracy, IP67, 0/14500 psi (0/1000 bar) Range – Industrial Precision Calibrator for Pressure Testing & Calibration-SIKA C2 (EME8REF-C2-1000)
short_description: Specs: (±0.05% FS) (0.1% in vacuum) 0/14500 psi (0/1000 bar); Pressure units: PSI, bar / mbar, kPa / MPa, kg/cm², mH2O, inH2O, Min/Max, Zero function, Bar Graph, IP67, 2x AA - 1500 hrs, shock & vibration proof, 100 hz (10ms) sample rate, 270 degree rotatable head, back lit, Connection Size: 1/4 bsp, 12 month warranty, DNV Rated, Factory Cert Provided & Manual

Versatile Measurement Range: From a vacuum to a 14,500 psi pressure gauge, the SIKA C2 is versatile for any task. It serves industries requiring accurate digital gauges for both low and high-pressure applications. Pressure ranges of 100 psi, 300 psi, 3000 psi, 10,000 psi, and more in between and below for your digital pressure gauge needs.

Rugged and Reliable Design: With an IP67 rating, vibration-resistant (5g @ 500Hz), and shockproof (25g for 11 ms) SIKA digital pressure gauge withstands harsh conditions. Its rugged zinc die-cast housing is oil-resistant, making it a reliable gas pressure tester and pressure transducer in field, lab, and plant settings. DNV rated for offshore environments and tough enough for land applications.

Advanced Real-Time Detection: The SIKA C2 digital pressure gauge features a 10ms sampling rate that accurately captures pressure spikes and transients other gauges miss—ideal for diagnostics and test bench use.
Rotatable Backlit Display: Large 15mm digits and 270° rotatable screen ensure optimal visibility even in tight or dark spaces.
product_description: The SIKA C2 Precision Digital Pressure Gauge is an exemplary tool designed for professionals across the oil & gas, industrial maintenance, QA/QC labs, marine, and instrumentation sectors. This high-performance instrument is characterized by its remarkable 0.05% full-scale accuracy, making it an indispensable resource for both stationary and mobile measurement and display of pressures. As a pressure reference, the SIKA C2 allows for seamless checking, setting, and calibration of other pressure measuring devices on site, ensuring precision and reliability in various applications. Pair the SIKA C2 with SIKA Test pumps for direct connection, or use a ¼" NPT adaptor to work with any other device. Works with any SIKA model, P4, P60, P700, P1000 or P160t. The rugged and reliable construction of the SIKA C2 is evident with its IP67 rating, vibration resistance (5g @ 500Hz), and shockproof capability (25g for 11 ms). Its durable zinc die-cast housing and oil-resistant surface ensure longevity and robustness in field, lab, and plant environments. The SIKA C2 is equipped with real-time peak detection, boasting a 10ms sampling rate that accurately captures pressure spikes often missed by other gauges, making it ideal for diagnostics and on test benches. The rotatable backlit display, featuring large 15mm digits and a 270° rotatable screen, guarantees optimal visibility, even in tight or dark spaces. Compatible with a wide range of applications, the SIKA C2 Digital Pressure Gauge supports various pressure measurements, including vacuum, hydraulic pressure applications, psi gauge, and pneumatic calibration, highlighting its versatility and adaptability in diverse industrial settings. Trust the SIKA C2 for a reliable, accurate, and efficient pressure measurement solution.
product_details: Item dimensions L x W x H ‎5 x 5 x 3 inches

name: General Tools EP8709 Calibratable Multi-Function Digital Psychrometer, Wet Bulb Capable
short_description: Accurately measure any environments temperature, relative humidity (RH), dew point, wet bulb temperature and other moisture parameters
Features a jumbo backlit display with double readout; minimum and maximum temperature button and data hold button on device as well
This device is field calibratable using optional 33% and 75% salts; toggle between Fahrenheit or Celsius with switch
Monitor battery life with low battery indicator; psychomotor an Auto Power Off saving your battery when not in use ( can be disabled for calibration)
product_description: General Tools and Instruments Multi-Function Psychomotor is perfect for accurately measure any environments temperature, wet bulb temperature, relative humidity (RH), dew point and other moisture parameters. Features a jumbo backlit display with double readout. This device is field calibratable using optional 33% and 75% salts and toggle between Fahrenheit or Celsius with the device's switch. This multifunctional tool has a data hold button and a minimum and maximum temperature button; it is also capable of calculating and displaying wet bulb temperature. Monitor battery life with the low battery indicator; the psychomotor also has a 20-minute Auto Power Off saving your battery charge when not in use (this feature can be disabled for calibration). 9V battery included. Limited 1-year warranty.

name: NEIKO 01401A 6-Inch Electronic Digital Caliper, Stainless Steel, Extra Large LCD Screen, Measurement Conversions for Inches, Millimeters, and Fractions
short_description: DIGITAL CALIPER MEASURING TOOL: Our 6-Inch Electronic Digital Caliper tool provides you with precise and accurate measurements. Use this digital ruler to find the diameter, depth, and step measurement of the materials you’re working with.

DIGITAL MEASUREMENTS: This digital caliper has a 1-button quick-change feature that easily converts between inch, fraction, and millimeter modes. Each number appears on the large and highly visible LCD screen.

VERSATILE MEASUREMENT TOOL: Our caliper measuring tool contains 2 sets of jaws and a probe to measure inside and outside depth and step measurements. Use these measuring calipers for wood, jewelry, metal, or other materials.

ACCURACY & PRECISION: This measuring caliper tool measures from 0"–6" and 0–150 mm and has a resolution of 0.0005" / 1/128" / 0.01 mm and an accuracy of 0.001" / 0.02 mm. This tool helps eliminate errors and miscalculations.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS: Made with polished and hardened stainless steel, the caliper’s frame has a durable feel with a knurled thumb roller and a locking screw for smooth sliding and accurate position locking.
product_description: Our 01401A 6-Inch Electronic Digital Caliper precisely and accurately measures a variety of materials. This tool can measure the diameter, width, length, depth, and step measurement of any material or item in inches and millimeters. It can also quickly convert between inches, fractions, and millimeters for easy readings. This precise measurement tool is great for woodworking, jewelry making, or other metal projects that need precise measurements. With a hardened and finely polished stainless-steel construction, this digital caliper is rust-resistant and will last through years of use. It features a knurled thumb roller that makes it easy to adjust the 2 sets of caliper jaws and a locking screw to keep the slider moving smoothly and lock it into place. It also has an extra-large LCD screen to display measurements in highly visible text for easy reading. The caliper is powered by an included LR44 battery. Use this digital caliper as a pipe-measuring tool for plumbing jobs or for a personal home project to get accurate and precise measurements. Whether you need to measure the diameter of a metal coin or need new measurement calipers for the jobsite, NEIKO has your back with our durable, dependable, and strong tools.
product_details: Number of Batteries ‎1 LR44 batteries required. (included)

name: Caliper Measuring Tool Digital Caliper Industrial Quality Precision Electronic Vernier Caliper Inch/Millimeter Measurement Micrometer for Jewelry - Accuracy Ip54 Waterproof Caliper Measure Tool
short_description: INDUSTRIAL GRADE: Different from most calipers using copper measuring sensors, our digital caliper adopts glass material sensor, which effectively prevents the accuracy of caliper effecting by temperature, humidity, magnetism, etc and greatly ensures the stability of measurement. You can easily minimize errors, save delays, and make high-precision measurements using our caliper measuring tool

PRECISION AND ACCURACY: You can measure thickness, width or depth down to 0.001 inch with our caliper. This level of precision is required if anything needs to be correctly fitted and sealed. It allows you to make pieces that fit perfectly and leave no room for error. measurement accuracy: 0.02mm/ 0.001 inch

LONGER USEFUL LIFE: The housing is composed of zinc alloy and the ruler of the caliper is made of first-class thickened stainless steel,Fine polished stainless steel and new groove processing on the depthometer provide a more attractive, smoother slide and reliable results.all metal construction ensures the longer spanlife of caliper

ZERO FUNCTION: Metric And Inch Conversion: Switch between metric and inch measurements, It can save our conversion time during the measurement process, smart design allows you to easily reset to zero by pressing the zero button and start a new measurement at any position on the scale, which is very suitable for differential measurements

EXTRA LARGE LCD SCREEN: Extra-Large LED screen allows you to read the measurement easily and quickly, even under strong sunlight or in dismal surroundings. Aslo the locking screws ensure that the measuring jaws are securely secured, allowing for more precise measurements

WIDE APPLICATION: Ideal digital micrometer for industrial and automotive, electrical, carpentry, carving, assembly, mechanical maintenance, professional, household measurement and office work fields. (30-day money-back for any reason and 12-month after-sales service for quality-related issues)

name: Sound Level Meter Calibrator, Precise Decibel Meter Calibrator with 3 Calibration Level 114dB & 94dB & 104dB, Professional Sound Pressure Level (SPL) Calibrator for Sound Level Meters
short_description: 【3 Calibration Level】DANOPLUS sound calibrator features 3 calibration levels and operates at a frequency of 1000 Hz. With a cavity diameter of 13.2 millimeters, align the microphone with the calibrator's cavity during use to prevent damage
【Portable】The sound meter calibrator is powered by 2 AA batteries, making it portable. It can be carried in a pocket, handbag, or even concealed in a sleeve
【Low Power Indicator】When the battery is low, a red light will illuminate to remind you to replace the batteries, ensuring the decibel meter calibrator functions properly
【User-fridendly】The universal design allows this SPL calibrator to be compatible with many sound level meters, making it very convenient to use
【Multi-function】The precise decibel meter calibrator features the following functions: Low Power Indicator, Portable, auto power off, switch Calibration Level (114dB / 94dB / 104dB)
